text: Egh nɨ kamaghɨn Israelian gumazamizibav kemegh, ‘Ia arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa damusɨ memen apuritam inigh. Egh ofan bar isi mɨghɨramibar amusɨ, bulmakaun azenir vamɨra ititam ko sipsipɨn apurir azenir vamɨra ititam inigh, na bagh ofa damu. Ia asɨzir aghuibara inigh, duatam men mɨkarzibar ikian markɨ.
